{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2505.00391v1", "title": "A Nonlinear Logistic Model for Age-Structured Populations: Analysis of
  Long-Term Dynamics and Equilibria", "summary": "This paper investigates a nonlinear logistic model for age-structured
population dynamics. The model incorporates interdependent fertility and
mortality functions within a logistic framework, offering insights into
stationary solutions and asymptotic behavior. Theoretical findings establish
conditions for the existence and uniqueness of equilibrium solutions and
explore long-term population dynamics. This study provides valuable tools for
demographic modeling and opens avenues for further mathematical exploration.", "main_category": "math.AP", "categories": "math.AP", "published": "2025-05-01T08:28:30Z"}
